data.title: Find Assisted Living, Memory Care and Senior Living Near Me
data.meta_description: Find the top assisted living, memory care & other senior living communities near you. Read reviews, get pricing & connect with a local Senior Living Advisor.
data.text:
Atria Westchase

Lisa V

5.0

This is such an amazing facility! The outside may be a little dated but this place has been here for years! I volunteered here in high school many years ago! The staff are amazing and always smiling! The residents are happy and will not hesitate to tell you how wonderful it is to live there! Of …

The Residence at Presque Isle Bay

Ray E Burhenn Rph - Resident/client

5.0

I am a resident at Presque isle on the bay,and here is why. There are only 51 people living here and there are like family. Just walking in the front door you can see the difference, it’s quaint quiet and friendly and the staff are here to help. Food is always good and they will always find you …

Heritage at The Plains at Parish Homestead

Anonymous - Resident/client

5.0

I am looking ahead to what comes next in my life following my husband's recent death. Moving to a nearby independent living facility, with little upkeep responsibility is important to me. My tour was excellent, my questions were answered, and the person conducting my visit was very knowledgeable …

Brookstone of Aledo

Mary B - Toured community

5.0

friendliness of staff, clean building, smells good appealing very welcoming when you walk in, food is great Tour was great and [name removed] is amazing & was an great listener & I was put on a waitlist and [name removed] visited me all the time bringing in and helping me. I'm so glad I'm here.

StoryPoint Gahanna

Anonymous - Resident/client

5.0

My experience has been good. The staff is friendly and helpful. The residences are very nice and make you feel welcome. We used [name removed] for a short time we were very satisfied with the care they gave. The food is okay but most of the time frustrating a lot of the time.

Grand Villa of Delray East

Barry P - Resident/client

5.0

Grand Villa East is an assisted living facility whose staff work very hard to assist the residents. The residents support each other. It's not a 5-star place but it is a solid 3. I would highly recommend any family who has an older relative who needs assistance with daily dining to visit, chat w …
